Due to the fact that our homes have been purchased by a new buyer, we should be able to verbalized concerns and have them dealt with and we should not be "punished" or retaliated against because of our concerns with units that we pay to live in. At this point, the retaliation has gotten so far out of control that I feel like we have no choice but to stand together and bring these concerns to the management team at Pinnacle that is off-site. 

We will get in contact with the office just to be sure that we are able to form a tenant association and then we will be posting dates and times soon. For anyone interested, I have obtained contact information and will share it with whoever wants it. Just send a message here.


Thank you all and I will be in touch -

It's been a few days since my last review, time for an update. 
Pest control company has caught several more rats in the building inside the ceiling of interior hallways. Rats still running across my bedroom ceiling at night. Shannon from Pinnacle Management that is the company who mismanages this so called luxury building still continues to hide from me. Will not contact me in regards to the issues only responds with lame excuse on Yelp to try and make herself look good. 
Residents moving out almost constantly. 
The I took this picture of all the mattresses piled up next to the dumpster that have been there at least the past 2 weeks. Guess they are waiting for the mattress fairy to magically take them away, since the trash people have been here twice a week and they are not in the dumpster.  One can only assume residents disposed of their mattress when they moved out or had to get rid if them because of bedbugs or something worse. 
This place is really a disgusting place to live.

Love this place, I got a place with patio where you can see the beautiful scenery from the strip, day and night. Although there were some issues caused by renovation procedure, the maintenance team had moved very fast, fixed within 5~10 mins. I think they are the best maintenance team I've ever seen in the US. Super fast and Super nice.

Pool&Gym are very nice and clean, I felt peaceful whenever I went there that I didn't need to go to hotel pool. 24hrs open gym is very convenient for me, working until 2~3am. 

At last, I would never enjoyed my half year in prime apartment without these cool neighbor and prime apartment management team. I really appreciate it.

Been living here for a year, and not one person I've met here in that time has resigned their lease. They were charging everyone an additional $200 for re-signing a lease, now they are charging $400 to re-sign due to everyone moving out on them. I truly believe that if the management actually cared about to tenants, than people would stay. A resident on the first floor here has been here for years, and are now moving out because they found huge holes in their walls created by rats. There were a couple rats found inside their unit in the walls. Don't just take my word for it, go ahead and yelp this place, I'm sure you'll read the review there. Also, My heater was out for a whole month this winter. My house was getting down to 66-69 degrees at night. From the very first time I put the work order in at the front desk to the third time putting a work order in I was told that my heater not working was not an urgent matter and they would get to it when they can. The heating system on these apartments are from the 70's, it's not the year that makes them old it's their performance level. In the summer time we had the same exact problem besides it was with our AC not cooling my house below 83 degrees. For the pet area it is never maintained, there is always dog waste everywhere, and there are even periods that they go without restocking the fecal bags for the dog area. It takes residents going to the office to complain; and even then nothing gets done until Noelle (the manager) feels like it's convenient for her. I don't mean to come off as a negative Nancy but you should be aware of what you are getting yourself into. Do some research on this place before moving in.

Update 7/30: after three maintenance requests, including a visit from management, they installed a window a/c unit in the bedroom that would not cool down.  It is now comfortable in that room.  Once things escalated to Noelle, we did receive resolution on this issue.

Additionally, we were offered the opportunity to move to another unit.  However, there are no other units available at this time.  

Due to the fact that Noelle is now assisting us, I have updated my review to 2 stars.

I LOOOOOVE where I live! This place in my opinion is amazing! The staff is wonderful and very friendly, Latasha (not sure if she's an office manager, but if not she should be) is wonderful and gets things done at a lightening fast pace. The view of the strip from my balcony is incredible. I can't say enough good things about this place. I love the lobby and all the renovations, we have a wifi room, an olympic size pool and a 24hr gym opening up in a month. My friends who come to visit are always impressed. It's seconds away from shopping (grocery stores, a mall and every type of restaurants that you could ask for (Indian, Jamaican, Thai, Sushi, etc. etc). I could not imagine a more perfect place to live.

I love living at prime! But what makes it very special is the management. Noelle and her team make sure all my needs are taken care of asap. She's whipped this place into shape sconce she came on board!They always have a smile on their face and are very friendly. I've been to a lot of places but his is hands down the best management team. 5 stars

Moving in next month in December, the front office/management team was amazing in making the transition as easy as possible for me from out of state. Thank you so much for your incredible customer service Saith, I really appreciated how knowledgeable you were about the amenities and layout of the units and your willingness to accommodate situations and requests whenever possible.

Yearly update: Prime Apartments managed by Pinnacle Management is still on top of the game. Noelle, Ashley and Faith, the Prime management team are professionals at work ensuring our community is safe, clean and ran with and ethical standard. As I said once before, if you're looking for an apartment that's convenient to everything, safe, clean and ran by the best management company in Las Vegas come see us at Prime Apartments.
Love this place. The staff was really friendly and the leasing process was quick and smooth. The office and common areas are well maintained. Location is great. Couldn't be happier!

Without a doubt the worst place I have lived in in my 40 yrs in Las Vegas. Water shut off for 3 days at a time, roaches, bed bugs, washers and dryers break down constantly and then u have to wait up to a month for a refund check of $1.25 or $1.50. Dog urine and feces throughout the bldg. A postage stamp size dog park with artificial turf that is never sanitized. U gag when u unhook ur pup from their leash. I am extremely clean and neat and paid a professional cleaner to come in and clean when I moved out. I am 100% disabled and had to leave a very small lightweight loveseat in the apt when I moved out. They charged me $200.00 to remove it to the trash. Two different people let me down that said they would remove it for me and for one reason or another that fell thru. They want me to pay the apt $200.00 to remove it. So I am not getting my deposit back and they want me to pay them $194.00!!!!!
Even the mgr said that maintenance had commented on how clean and nice my apt was. They pay their maintenance people minimum wage and work them to death. The head of maintenance found a new job and the two that r left practically run from 1 job to another. The current head of maintenance was out of breath an sweating almost every time I saw him. There were 4 murders not even a half block. They raised some people's rent up to $400.00 and said it was due to what the other buildings in the area were commanding. Prime is right next door to Siegel Suites (they share a wall) and all day long you listen to people yelling and screaming at each and F_ck Y_u. The police r at one place or the other every day. The only good thing about Prime is the fact that u can walk toTarget and Vons for necessities. I lived in Manhattan for numerous yrs. and no longer drive. The fact that I could walk to get my groceries was great.....the gym is nice too....but the day to day quality of life simply isn't there. It is a DUMP...plain and simple. Oh yes...how could I forget the arrogance of the front desk and management. They seem to think that taking our rent money is a favor to US. They seem to forget that WE pay THEIR salaries.
I have NEVER lived in such a deplorable place.
Oh yes the drug dealing and addicts that live here r overwhelming as r the resident and in and out hookers.
PIG STY!!!!!!!!!!!! If I could give it no stsrs and get this posted I would.
The property manager was outstanding. She answered all my questions. Very helpful. Can not wait to move in. would recommend Prime to anyone that's looking for a place to call home.

This is an amazing community. Noelle and her professional team really enforce the community policy so its a great place to call home. They are always so attentive and get my needs addressed promptly. By the way, LOVE the new gym!
